	-token.mint(fourthBatch,teamTokens.div(2).div(3)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x7c33f3d417ef65a5299998bf7bbd35921963336c.sol)
	-token.mint(FSNASAddress,FSNASTokens) (/unique_chucks/11/0x7c33f3d417ef65a5299998bf7bbd35921963336c.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/11/0x7c33f3d417ef65a5299998bf7bbd35921963336c.sol)

FNTCrowdsale.addPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x7c33f3d417ef65a5299998bf7bbd35921963336c.sol#1140-1170) does not use the value returned by external calls:
